description: A percutaneous drainage catheter is a tube that is inserted into the body to drain fluid collections.

attributes.name: Presence of Percutaneous Drainage Catheter
attributes.description: Indicates whether a percutaneous drainage catheter is present or absent.

attributes.name: Status
attributes.description: Indicates the status of the percutaneous drainage catheter placement.

attributes.name: Appropriate location
attributes.description: Indicates whether the percutaneous drainage catheter is appropriately located.

attributes.name: Side
attributes.description: Indicates the side of the percutaneous drainage catheter.

attributes.name: Location
attributes.description: Indicates the location of the percutaneous drainage catheter.

attributes.name: Catheter Size (French)
attributes.description: Indicates the size of the percutaneous drainage catheter in French units.

attributes.name: Complications
attributes.description: Indicates whether there are any complications related to the percutaneous drainage catheter.

attributes.name: Fluid collection
attributes.description: Indicates whether there is a fluid collection associated with the percutaneous drainage catheter.
